intro: Light meets gravity, and perfection starts to fall apart.
description:
This story follows the transformation of the city of Aeros, where a forced partnership between a teacher of light and a gravity expert leads to the discovery that their world’s perfection is actually a façade of control and manipulation. As the protagonists move beyond their differences, they must choose between maintaining an artificial order or embracing a painful truth that threatens to destroy their old loyalties. Ultimately, the tale explores how true stability isn’t born from imposed purity, but from accepting duality and the honest coexistence of opposites.
An interactive storybook experience. A linear narrative adventure, perfect for young readers to enjoy a captivating story at their own pace.
